decks.notes: This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures and burn spells, all while utilizing Underworld Breach for extra value. By utilizing cards like Lightning Bolt, Lava Dart, and Mutagenic Growth, this deck can quickly deal damage to the opponent and control the board. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an extra layer of versatility to the deck. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistency and enable the deck to play its spells efficiently.

This deck focuses on utilizing creature toolbox cards to assemble specific combos for victory. By combining creatures with abilities such as summoning, protection, and evasion, the deck aims to create powerful synergies to overwhelm opponents. Cards like Springheart Nantuko, Endurance, and Nadu, Winged Wisdom work together to generate advantage and disrupt opponents' strategies. The deck also includes utility lands like Yavimaya, Cradle of Growth and Boseiju, Who Endures to support its combo-focused gameplay. Overall, the deck aims to efficiently access and utilize its toolbox of creatures to secure a win.

This deck focuses on assembling a toolbox of creatures to combo off and win the game. It utilizes cards like Chord of Calling and Summoner's Pact to search for specific creatures needed to execute various combos. Cards like Urza's Saga and Springheart Nantuko help to generate additional value and provide additional win conditions. The deck also utilizes various lands to help facilitate the combo pieces and protect them against disruption. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with its synergies and powerful creatures.

The core idea of this Modern Aggro - Death's Shadow deck is to quickly reduce your own life total to make Death's Shadow a powerful threat while also disrupting your opponent's game plan through disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Counterspell. The deck also utilizes graveyard synergies with cards like Drown in the Loch and Murktide Regent to maximize efficiency. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Stubborn Denial and Fatal Push help deal with opposing threats while maintaining pressure on the opponent. Overall, this deck aims to be proactive and disruptive in order to come out on top in a 1 vs 1 match.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by using Eldrazi creatures and powerful control spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Devourer of Destiny and Talisman of Impulse to cast big Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Ulamog, the Defiler. Cards like All Is Dust and Kozilek's Command help clear the opponent's board, while Through the Breach can cheat in creatures for a surprise attack. Overall, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with huge threats while controlling the game.

The main idea of this Mardu Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Galvanic Discharge, and Static Prison, the deck aims to control the board while steadily chipping away at the opponent's life total. With the addition of powerful creatures like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, the deck can quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to mount a defense. The inclusion of a companion, Jegantha, the Wellspring, adds another versatile threat to ensure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing various mill cards to quickly deplete the opponent's library, ultimately winning through decking them out. Cards like Archive Trap, Ruin Crab, and Fractured Sanity work together to mill large amounts of cards at once, while Tasha's Hideous Laughter can exile key cards from the opponent's graveyard. The inclusion of control elements like Path to Exile and Snapcaster Mage helps to control the board while the deck works towards the win condition. Overall, the strategy revolves around efficiently milling the opponent's library while maintaining control of the game.

The main concept of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt opponent's hands and game plan using cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while also utilizing removal spells such as Fatal Push and Fell the Profane to control the board. The deck focuses on powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Boggart Trawler to close out the game, and uses cards like Necrodominance and Soul Spike for additional value and reach. The inclusion of Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth and Phyrexian Tower provides mana fixing and acceleration for the deck's high impact plays.

The main strategy of this deck is to control the opponent's draws, hand, and resources using cards like Ensnaring Bridge, Lantern of Insight, and Pithing Needle. The deck aims to lock the opponent out of the game by denying them access to key resources and controlling the board state. It also utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to disrupt the opponent's game plan and keep them on the back foot. The deck can also search for specific cards with Ancient Stirrings and Urza's Saga to further solidify its control over the game.
